text: ==Events== * Heraclius prepares to leave Constantinople. He moves the Byzantine capital to Carthage. * The Second Perso-Turkic War is fought. It ends with a strong Persian victory. * Muhammad's wife, Khadija, dies after 24 years of marriage. * Kubrat, ruler of the Bulgars, is baptised in Constantinople. * December 23 - Pope Boniface V succeeds Adeodatus I as the 69th pope of Rome. * Death of Khadijah bint Khuwaylid Category:619
